code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[role,setRole]=useState("Student");const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=()=>{if(role==="Admin"){navigate("/admin");}else{navigate("/dashboard");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 max-w-sm mx-auto mt-10 border rounded shadow bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-center",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:role,onChange:e=>setRole(e.target.value),className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Student"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Admin"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username",className:"mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",className:"mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-4 py-2 w-full rounded",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mt-4 text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",className:"text-blue-600 underline",children:"Create an account"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/forgot",className:"text-blue-600 underline",children:"Forgot password?"})})]})]});}export default Login;
